title: Champ Select Reporting
body:
I am just wondering if there is a way to report people for what they say/do in champ select, or if it is only possible after game. I just had a champ select where a player called me an n'er roughly 15 times in champ select because I would not dodge for his friend. Why are we not able to report stuff like this?

PS: Just because my name is douchecanoe does not mean i am one ;)

replies.body: Report it after the game in post-game.
There isn't always a post-game. He was harassing the team to get someone to dodge. So this person will pretty much get away without punishment.

I hear what you're saying, and this is a problem that is on our radar.

Both pre and post game chat are recorded. They aren't looked at initially by the Instant Feedback System, but Riot does have records of them and can pull them if needed when reviewing a player. So yes, it is reportable, just make sure that you specify that you are reporting for pre/post game chat. 

With that said, as per the [Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules), we do not allow "Naming and Shaming" here on the boards, so I've gone ahead and removed the summoner name from your comment.
Ya sorry I should have mentioned that. The person dodged before the game started so there was no way of reporting them.
im pretty sure you can also send in a ticket but idk
Actually no, if you do that riot shadow flags your account for worse matches for wasting their staffs time.
That isn't true lol, but Riot does not accept screenshot reports and ticket reports because it is easy to photoshop chat logs. This is actual information I've seen a rioter post before.

I wanted to test this out to see if it worked. On a new account i spammed swear words at my team post game till they said theyd report me. After doing it about 10 times with 3 times getting reported 9 times (or so they say), i never got banned.

Once i did it get banned, it never showed the swear words i posted post game in the chat logs. Does the report system even record the post-game messages?
Legitimately cannot believe you've said this. This is the stuff that makes people think Riot is clueless.

what's more amazing is the fact that in order to do that, you have to play an entire game with the toxic a hole. Which can in turn make you lose ranking and points, as well as not having a fun experience.. Hell, it can even get to the point that this toxic person can make you mentally break. 

I bet you 7 out of 10 people punished in the "behavior" system are those that finally snapped when provoked by someone who's been constantly toxic for the majority of his last few games. Muting doesn't really work as you can still see pings from them as well as being the victim of their, more than likely, intentional feeding. 

But sure, go ahead and keep punishing smite nunu supports..
It's tuff cuz you pretty much have to be recording your Champ select and send that to Support ticket to do anything.
